episode_title: A Call from the Red Box - London Nostalgia

events.speaker: Operator
events.utterance: Connecting you now. Mind the weather, sir.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Caller
events.utterance: He estado bien. Algunos días están bien, otros son difíciles y algunos son absolutamente fantásticos. Espero que estés bien.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Recipient
events.utterance: ¡Qué maravilla escucharte! Me alegra que las cosas vayan bien en general.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Caller
events.utterance: Ah, my dear friend! It's been ages since we spoke from these iconic booths.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Caller
events.utterance: Remember when we'd queue for hours just to make a call home?
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Recipient
events.utterance: Indeed! These red sentinels have witnessed countless stories - proposals, emergencies, farewells.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Recipient
events.utterance: Each coin dropped, each dial turned, each voice carried across the wires...
events.label: cognitive_load

events.speaker: Caller
events.utterance: They may be fewer now, but their spirit lives on in London.
events.label: rhetorical

events.speaker: Caller
events.utterance: Thank you for preserving this piece of our history.
events.label: handoff

events.speaker: Recipient
events.utterance: And thank you for remembering. Goodbye for now.
events.label: handoff

events.speaker: Operator
events.utterance: Call completed. Please hang up and retrieve your change.
events.label: other
